tool_description:
This is the code for the tutorial on my blog.

https://amirkamizi.com/blog/php-simple-rest-api
title: PHP Simple REST

api_list.name: store-new-user
api_list.description: Use this endpoint to add a new user
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://php-simple-rest.p.rapidapi.com/api/users"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "php-simple-rest.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: delete-one-user
api_list.description: use this endpoint to delete a user
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://php-simple-rest.p.rapidapi.com/api/users/1"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "php-simple-rest.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.delete(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: get-users
api_list.description: use this endpoint to get all the users
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://php-simple-rest.p.rapidapi.com/api/users"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "php-simple-rest.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: update-one-user
api_list.description: use this endpoint to update a user
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://php-simple-rest.p.rapidapi.com/api/users/1"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "php-simple-rest.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.put(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: get-one-user

api_list.name: store-new-user
api_list.description: Use this endpoint to add a new user
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://php-simple-rest.p.rapidapi.com/api/users"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "php-simple-rest.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://php-simple-rest.p.rapidapi.com/api/users"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "php-simple-rest.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
